Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Implement batch enrichment, scoring logic, and dashboard workflow (T043-T053)

Add comprehensive batch enrichment system with real-time progress tracking, persona-based scoring, and integrated dashboard workflow for trade show intelligence platform.

Key Features:
- Batch enrichment job queue with in-memory tracking (T043)
- Batch enrichment API with 10-company parallel processing (T044)
- Server-Sent Events (SSE) for real-time progress updates (T046)
- Status polling API for job monitoring (T045)
- Real-time progress indicator component (T047)
- Tier calculation logic with fit score thresholds (T048)
- Persona fit score calculation with weighted criteria (T049)
- Persona match persistence in storage adapter (T050)
- Complete dashboard workflow with 5 steps (T051-T053)

Implementation Details:
- lib/enrichment/batch-queue.ts: In-memory job tracking with auto-cleanup
- app/api/enrichment/batch/route.ts: POST endpoint for batch jobs, GET endpoint for SSE streaming
- app/api/enrichment/status/[jobId]/route.ts: Job status polling and deletion
- components/dashboard/enrichment-progress.tsx: Real-time progress UI with SSE
- lib/scoring/tier-calculator.ts: Hot/Warm/Cold/Unscored tier logic
- lib/scoring/persona-matcher.ts: 7-criteria weighted scoring algorithm
- app/dashboard/page.tsx: Event setup â†’ Upload â†’ Mapping â†’ Enrichment â†’ Complete workflow

Technical Highlights:
- Parallel batch processing (10 companies concurrently)
- Real-time SSE streaming with 500ms polling interval
- 3-part error messaging (what failed, how to fix, example format)
- Data coverage validation (minimum 30% required for scoring)
- Storage adapter integration for persistence
- Constitution compliance (hub-and-spoke pattern, pluggable storage)

All tasks validated against specification requirements and data model definitions. Dashboard now provides complete end-to-end workflow from CSV upload through enrichment to tier-categorized reports.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
